headline: SPDR’s Aerospace & Defense ETF Took An Unusual Approach That Smoked The S&P 500 With 54% Run
summary: When geopolitical tensions rise or defense budgets expand, investors often chase the sector through broad market funds. But SPDR S&P Aerospace & Defense ETF (NYSEARCA:XAR) doesn’t work like most sector plays. It spreads capital equally across 41 holdings, giving smaller aerospace suppliers and emerging space companies the same weight as industry giants like Boeing (NYSE:BA) ... SPDR’s Aerospace & Defense ETF Took An Unusual Approach That Smoked The S&P 500 With 54% Run

headline: Is Nvidia Set to Help Joby Aviation Become the Tesla of the Skies?
summary: The eVTOL company is preparing for certification in 2026 and also playing the long game in developing autonomous eVTOL, with the help of Nvidia.
